Package uk.ac.ed.inf.aqmaps

Class GeoJsonDeserialiser

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ed.inf.aqmaps.GeoJsonDeserialiser
  • public final class GeoJsonDeserialiser
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class used to generate GeoJson strings which contain methods to make Features of sensor locations and the final flight path of the drone.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description

      From a list of points and a list of sensors, generate a GEOJSON map with lines representing the path the drone has taken and the list of sensors to mark their locations with appropriate attributes on the map

    • Method Detail

      • addAppropriateProperties

        private static void addAppropriateProperties​(com.mapbox.geojson.Feature feat,
                                             Sensor sensor)
        Helper function to add appropriate attributes given a feature and a sensor
        Parameters:
        feat - Feature to add properties to
        sensor - The sensor used to help add properties to the feature created from sensor

      • mapReadingToColour

        private static java.lang.String mapReadingToColour​(Sensor sensor)
        Helper function to make mappings of readings to the appropriate colour properties. The function also evaluates the state of the sensor when reading is not appropriate (Not visited or Low battery).
        Parameters:
        sensor - The sensor to get readings from
        Returns:
        The colour hexadecimal String value depending on the state of the sensor

      • mapReadingToSymbol

        private static java.lang.String mapReadingToSymbol​(Sensor sensor)
        Helper function to Map reading to the appropriate marker symbols for each feature for GEOJSON.
        Parameters:
        sensor - The sensor to get readings from.
        Returns:
        Returns appropriate String marker depending on status of sensor battery and the reading returned.

      • createLinePath

        private static com.mapbox.geojson.Feature createLinePath​(java.util.List<com.mapbox.geojson.Point> path)
        Create a Feature from a list of points that are turned into a LineString
        Parameters:
        path - The list of points
        Returns:
        Feature representing the line (list of points)

      • markSensorsOnMap

        public static java.util.List<com.mapbox.geojson.Feature> markSensorsOnMap​(Sensor[] listOfSensors)
        Create new features using the coordinates of the sensor location, and add the appropriate attributes.
        Parameters:
        listOfSensors - The list of sensors to mark on the map
        Returns:
        the list of features generated.

      • createGeoJSONMapReadings

        public static void createGeoJSONMapReadings​(java.util.List<com.mapbox.geojson.Point> path,
                                            Sensor[] listOfSensors)
        From a list of points and a list of sensors, generate a GEOJSON map with lines representing the path the drone has taken and the list of sensors to mark their locations with appropriate attributes on the map
        Parameters:
        path - The complete pathing taken by the drone
        listOfSensors - the list of sensors the drone needs to visit on its path.
